## AUTHENTICATION\_METADATA\_METHOD\_KEY variable

The key used to store method-level metadata for `@authenticate`

**Signature:**

```typescript
AUTHENTICATION_METADATA_METHOD_KEY: MetadataAccessor<AuthenticationMetadata, MethodDecorator>
```
